member.name: P:KillerBeesGaming_Client.Bn.Classes.FileDownloader.SupportsProgress
member.summary: Gets or sets if the FileDownloader should support total progress statistics. Note that when enabled, the FileDownloader will have to get the size of each file before starting to download them, which can delay the operation.

member.name: P:KillerBeesGaming_Client.Bn.Classes.FileDownloader.DeleteCompletedFilesAfterCancel
member.summary: Gets or sets if when the download process is cancelled the complete downloads should be deleted

member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the blocks that will be downloaded

member.name: P:KillerBeesGaming_Client.Bn.Classes.FileDownloader.StopWatchCyclesAmount
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of blocks that need to be downloaded before the progress speed is re-calculated. Note: setting this to a low value might decrease the accuracy

member.name: T:KillerBeesGaming_Client.Bn.Classes.FileDownloader
member.summary: Class for downloading files in the background that supports info about their progress, the total progress, cancellation, pausing, and resuming. The downloads will run on a separate thread so you don't have to worry about multihreading yourself.
member.remarks: Class FileDownloader v1.0.3, by De Dauw Jeroen - May 2009
